text: Western Kentucky University is a public university in Bowling Green, Kentucky. The university has about 20,712 students. It was founded in 1906. The current president of the university is Dr. Gary A. Ransdell.https://www.usnews.com/best-colleges/western-kentucky-university-2002 ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university for men are called the Hilltoppers and the athletics teams for the women are called the Lady Toppers. They have 17 varsity teams, all of which play in Conference USA. ==References== ==Other websites== *Western Kentucky University's official website *Western Kentucky Hilltoppers' official athletics website Category:Conference USA Category:Colleges and universities in Kentucky Category:1906 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Kentucky
title: Western Kentucky University
